duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer experiences and create an exceptional shopping experience through effective support of customer shopping needs, sales transactions, and returns.
Greet and approach customers to understand their needs, process sales transactions, and promote company programs.
Adhere to safety, loss prevention, and standard operating procedures while creating an inclusive store environment for everyone.
Take an all-hands-on-deck approach to support the team across the store and perform other assigned tasks by management.
